00015 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/template_arity_spec.hpp"
00016 #include "boost/mpl/bool.hpp"
00017 #include "boost/mpl/aux_/lambda_support.hpp"

00020 #if defined(__SUNPRO_CC)
00021 #   define BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_VALUE_DECL(C) \
00022     typedef mpl::bool_< C > type; \
00023     enum { value = type::value }; \
00024     
00025 #   define BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_C_BASE(C)
00026 
00027 #elif defined(BOOST_MSVC) && BOOST_MSVC <= 1200
00028 
00029 #   define BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_VALUE_DECL(C) \
00030     typedef mpl::bool_< C > base_; \
00031     using base_::value; \
00032     
00033 
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 #ifndef BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_VALUE_DECL
00037 #   define BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_VALUE_DECL(C) 
00038 #endif
00039 
00040 #ifndef BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_C_BASE
00041 #   define BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_C_BASE(C) : mpl::bool_< C >
00042 #endif 
00043 
00044 
00045 #define BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_DEF1(trait,T,C) \
00046 template< typename T > struct trait \
00047     BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_C_BASE(C) \
00048 { \
00049     BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_VALUE_DECL(C) \
00050     BOOST_MPL_AUX_LAMBDA_SUPPORT(1,trait,(T)) \
00051 }; \
00052 \
00053 BOOST_TT_AUX_TEMPLATE_ARITY_SPEC(1,trait) \
00054 
00055 
00056 
00057 #define BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_DEF2(trait,T1,T2,C) \
00058 template< typename T1, typename T2 > struct trait \
00059     BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_C_BASE(C) \
00060 { \
00061     BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_VALUE_DECL(C) \
00062     BOOST_MPL_AUX_LAMBDA_SUPPORT(2,trait,(T1,T2)) \
00063 }; \
00064 \
00065 BOOST_TT_AUX_TEMPLATE_ARITY_SPEC(2,trait) \
00066 
00067 
00068 #define BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_SPEC1(trait,sp,C) \
00069 template<> struct trait< sp > \
00070     BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_C_BASE(C) \
00071 { \
00072     BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_VALUE_DECL(C) \
00073     BOOST_MPL_AUX_LAMBDA_SUPPORT_SPEC(1,trait,(sp)) \
00074 }; \
00075 
00076 
00077 #define BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_SPEC2(trait,sp1,sp2,C) \
00078 template<> struct trait< sp1,sp2 > \
00079     BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_C_BASE(C) \
00080 { \
00081     BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_VALUE_DECL(C) \
00082     BOOST_MPL_AUX_LAMBDA_SUPPORT_SPEC(2,trait,(sp1,sp2)) \
00083 }; \
00084 
00085 
00086 #define BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC1(trait,sp,C) \
00087 template<> struct trait##_impl< sp > \
00088 { \
00089     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, value = (C)); \
00090 }; \
00091 
00092 
00093 #define BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC2(trait,sp1,sp2,C) \
00094 template<> struct trait##_impl< sp1,sp2 > \
00095 { \
00096     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, value = (C)); \
00097 }; \
00098 
00099 
00100 #define BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC1_1(param,trait,sp,C) \
00101 template< param > struct trait< sp > \
00102     BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_C_BASE(C) \
00103 { \
00104     BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_VALUE_DECL(C) \
00105 }; \
00106 
00107 
00108 #define BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC1_2(param1,param2,trait,sp,C) \
00109 template< param1, param2 > struct trait< sp > \
00110     BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_C_BASE(C) \
00111 { \
00112     BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_VALUE_DECL(C) \
00113 }; \
00114 
00115 
00116 #define BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC2_1(param,trait,sp1,sp2,C) \
00117 template< param > struct trait< sp1,sp2 > \
00118     BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_C_BASE(C) \
00119 { \
00120     BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_VALUE_DECL(C) \
00121     BOOST_MPL_AUX_LAMBDA_SUPPORT_SPEC(2,trait,(sp1,sp2)) \
00122 }; \
00123 
00124 
00125 #define BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC2_2(param1,param2,trait,sp1,sp2,C) \
00126 template< param1, param2 > struct trait< sp1,sp2 > \
00127     BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_C_BASE(C) \
00128 { \
00129     BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_VALUE_DECL(C) \
00130 }; \
00131 
00132 
00133 #define BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_IMPL_PARTIAL_SPEC2_1(param,trait,sp1,sp2,C) \
00134 template< param > struct trait##_impl< sp1,sp2 > \
00135 { \
00136     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, value = (C)); \
00137 }; \

00140 #ifndef BOOST_NO_CV_SPECIALIZATIONS
00141 #   define BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_CV_SPEC1(trait,sp,value) \
00142     BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_SPEC1(trait,sp,value) \
00143     BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_SPEC1(trait,sp const,value) \
00144     BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_SPEC1(trait,sp volatile,value) \
00145     BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_SPEC1(trait,sp const volatile,value) \
00146

00153 #if 0  // there are true_type and false_type already in boost::
00154        // This also induces dependencies which may be undesirable
00155        // Let's wait until sometime not just before a release and clean
00156        // the whole ct_if mess up.
00157 # ifndef BOOST_TT_INTEGRAL_CONSTANT
00158 #  define BOOST_TT_INTEGRAL_CONSTANT
00159 #  include <boost/mpl/integral_c.hpp>
00160 
00161 //
00162 // this is not a TR1 conforming integral_constant,
00163 // but it is a first start:
00164 //
00165 
00166 namespace boost{
00167 
00168 template <class T, T val>
00169 struct integral_constant
00170 : public mpl::integral_c<T,val> {};
00171 
00172 
00173 template<> struct integral_constant< bool, true > \
00174     BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_C_BASE(true) \
00175 { \
00176     BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_VALUE_DECL(true) \
00177     BOOST_MPL_AUX_LAMBDA_SUPPORT_SPEC(1,integral_constant,(bool)) \
00178 };
00179 template<> struct integral_constant< bool, false > \
00180     BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_C_BASE(false) \
00181 { \
00182     BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_VALUE_DECL(false) \
00183     BOOST_MPL_AUX_LAMBDA_SUPPORT_SPEC(1,integral_constant,(bool)) \
00184 };
00185 
00186 namespace pending {
00187 typedef mpl::true_ true_type;
00188 typedef mpl::false_ false_type;
00189 }
00190 
00191 }
00192 
00193 # endif
00194 #endif
